posts.postText:
I was playing on SLA's TTT server cuz nobody was playing ours since gmod broke.

Innoncents have a few things like radar, body armour, binoculars, and stun stick (more dmg and farther push than crowbar)
I believe a credit is earned by killing a traitor.

A few cool traitor things I saw were landmines, and an EMP which makes a traitor test think you're innocent.

These seemed like cool features to me, so I thought I'd suggest ''em :D

**Oh, and as traitor there is a WORKING pain station. I just got killed by it (as another traitor :/) and it works perfectly.

Don't know :P

There's more custom stuff than that even , but I was too lazy to post it all, and this was just the stuff i thought would be cool :3
